attributes.review:
This app is just awful and promotes an awful man and an awful way of looking at the world. It promotes hate in our society where there should be love and understanding. When I opened the app I almost had a heart attack because of the ugly deformed picture on the front of a wrinkly old orange. Also it doesn’t look safe because it’s asking for my phone number right off the bat. Instead of being worried about tiktok we should worry about this app stealing our data and apparently our personalities and ability to get our heads out of our presidents butt to see the world for what it actually is. 

Here is a personal message to the president AKA bunker boy: 
🧚🏿✨𝓼𝓱𝓾𝓽 𝓽𝓱𝓮 𝓯𝓾𝓬𝓴 𝓾𝓹✨🧚‍♀️

xuě🧚huā🧜‍♀️piāo🍃piāo✨běi🥺fēng🖤 xiào🧿xiào🥵

💖You are the center of my universe ✨🌹🥺the densest objects have the most gravity🧚‍♂️ 

Everyone can try and come back from their mistakes🦋🧚🏿🧚🏿😸 but your mom can’t now😜😗💖😍

Chicken 🐔 wing 🍗 chicken 🐓 wing 🦢 hotdog 🌭 and baloney 🍖 chicken 🐔 and macaroni 🍝 chillin 😎 with my homie 👩

I spoke to the queen of the tré🌿🌳she said no thank you but good try🦋✨🌈🥰💓

P.S. please release Barron trump and let him live his life. He doesn’t deserve to be stuck with you and he seems like such a nice kid so I’d hate it if you corrupted him with your presence.

XOXO Gossip girl 😘
attributes.title: Horrible just like our president 😊

attributes.review:
First off, I would just like to say, that I am a full-time trumpel lumpel stand 💖and a part-time Home Depot 🏠employee💰. I was excited😻 to show off this 🔈#sponsored app to my depot dawgs 🐕but it said I’m not a real trumpel and that made me cry 😿. BUT THEN it hacked into my amazon wish list 🙀🙈and sent me a 20 inch😼 t-Rex grabber toy for children 5 and under that I wanted to buy in order to wipe 🧻 correctly because of my crippling IBS🗣🍑💨🧆... I didn’t think trumpel would ever do something like that to me🐱... it had a note 💌attached to it that said📜 “ from trump: no dump.. 4 u because you are skunk. 
Signed,
Trumpel”.

 Trumpel, you hurt me but I lobe you❤️. Trumpel later DMd me saying “got milk?🥛”, really sweet words trumpel but you are on thin ice mister 😽😻🤧

-Hemorrhoid Homies
Much love kings but not for you trumpel
attributes.title: Just wow... can’t believe

attributes.review: Like the title states this app actually had sexual intercourse with my father. Once my mother discovered his infidelity, she filed for divorce. Heartbroken over the destruction of his family unit my dad told the Trump app he couldn’t continue their sexual affair. To get revenge on us, the Trump app then snuck into my home and shot our family dog. This app is the most horrible, smelly, dangerous, revolting, unethical, and murders dogs. It is also a furry which is really uncomfortable. If I could give it zero stars i would. I hope you find this review helpful!
attributes.title: This app split up my parents marriage and then shot my dog

attributes.review: This app is literally the worse thing ever created. Downloading this app actually took years off of my life. So disappointed. -10000/10 would not recommend. Pretty embarrassing to be honest.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: what if you were the only person that would have a good time and i is that time for you and you have a lot more to sleep over than ever before you go back and get it and i was the time you get back into a good night you have had to a good start and you get a good start and you get a lot more than that and stuff like you do you wanna is a way you get a good time with you so i was a time for you and i is that the time you wanna see ya girl and you have the time you wanna go get your girl you wanna is a time to go to sleep so you don't want me going back and you get a lot more than i i was like that you don't have any good time to go get to the party you know i was like that you cannot is a time of time you wanna go get your hair and get a little more fun to do that it would have to go get out and then get a good girl you know you have to be friends and you have a lot of time and stuff to go to see you and you have a good day love ya love yeah yeah you don't want me going back and stuff and you have a good day i was the time of time i is the day i is the year to go get out and do it i wanna was? ❤️
attributes.title: the worst app to ever exist

attributes.review: Such a horrible app !!! this actually made my flying bison try to eat my flying monkey! It even caused my pencils to pee, poop, shower & some even shaved😭😡😡😡 and then my favorite ghost actually tried to commit suicide!!! Do u know how scared for they’re life I was! He could’ve died!! UNFORGIVABLE !!!
attributes.title: my flying bison tried to eat my flying monkey!!!
